doc: [QUESTION] Is it possible to use the HeadingRow concern but still access the $row array with the default index

I have to import a spreadsheet in which the heading row started from row 3, So i used the HeadingRow concern and set the start of the row to be 3. But this limit us to use the heading index as key to access the desired columns.
Problem is, i have a columns that have the same column heading in my spreadsheet.
using the HeadingRow removes all the redundant heading rows.
So my main question is, how to makethe import reading to start from a certain row while still accessing the row array as $row[0] <- something like this.
